name: Escape! (itch) (The CJ Games)
description:
You are locked in a room with complex puzzles to solve and items hidden around the room, some of which will help you find the key to get out of the room and escape the game.

In Escape! players must use their wits and deductive reasoning skills to escape the the rooms within the game. There are no penalties for guessing wrong. Gameplay is a mix of adventure and puzzle solving. The game supports local single player for those who love conquering a puzzle on their own.

Escape! puts you in a series of rooms, some with hidden items, and some without a clue as to what to do. When a room is solved, you figure it out, and get the necessary items to escape.

Use the power of your mind, analytical skills, and a pick at finding objects to help you escape. Each room is different, with their own challenging puzzles, so you might find yourself never finishing the game.

Feel free to leave any helpful reviews as they will be greatly appreciated and will give me a better insight in what i need to do better on in the future.

Enjoy the game
